DOC.brief_summary: The objective study determine safety tolerability determine Pharmacokinetic Pharmacodynamic ( PK/PD ) ascend single oral dose BR-A-657 healthy male subject .
DOC.brief_title: Fimasartan ( BR-A-657 ) Single Oral Dose Healthy Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: BR-A-657 20 , 50 , 120 , 240 , 360 , 480mg placebo administer healthy male subject . Pharmacokinetic Pharmacodynamic ( PK/PD ) parameter monitor pre-specified time subject . PK parameter : Area Under Curve ( AUC ) , Cmax , half-life , etc . PD parameter : Aldosterone , Plasma renin activity , Angiotensin I , Angiotensin II Adverse event report .
DOC.criteria: male 1855 year old Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 1929kg/m2 subject good health subject write informed consent subject multiple drug allergy allergy Angiotensin Receptor Blocker ( ARB ) subject medication affect drug absorption elimination within 30days . subject orthostatic hypotension > 20mmHg decrease Systolic Blood Pressure ( SBP ) subject history neurologic , liver , renal , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , psychological major disorder
